verses.name: Mark 14:27
verses.text: And Jesus saith unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.

verses.name: Mark 14:28
verses.text: But after that I am risen, I will go before you into Galilee.

verses.name: Mark 14:29
verses.text: But Peter said unto him, Although all shall be offended, yet will not I.

verses.name: Mark 14:30
verses.text: And Jesus saith unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this day, even in this night, before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice.
